tags: Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,
review:
The doctor could have been more helpful over online consultation rather than being very rigid about ultrasound scan.  No information or help was provided.
If so then, there is no point of being available in Practo for online consultation.
reply_text: I understand your concern and your expectations. I too expect to see the patient one on one to understand better and give appropriate treatment. If the solution provided is investigation dependent then it needs to be done, even if it was one on one offline consultation . According to the law online consultation has a lot of restrictions. I wish to give needed and appropriate treatment as much as I can to all. I too intend to help online patients but boundaries are set bylaw. I need to work within that. I wish you good health.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Doctor Indu, analysed my situation correctly and the 
the only treatment option she gave me was to reduce my weight and she directed me in the right dietician. Today I'm an expectant mother, only because of Dr. Indu's guidance. She is very friendly and a kind doctor. Her way of treatment approach involves very minimal medications and I really liked that a lot. I would highly recommend Dr.Indu.

Dr.Indu has been the most approachable doctor I have visited. She addresses all the small and big doubts with equal importance. As my doctor she not only care for my physical health but makes sure my mental health is also fine and I am at peace which is very important during the pregnancy phase. The comfort level with her during my consultation is 10/10. I am glad that I was referred to her. :)
